attributes.action: Make the coronavirus vaccine available 24 hours a day.
attributes.additional_details: To speed up the process of vaccination. Millions of people have been denied an income/ support/ family contact for nearly a year. We need to fast track the vaccination service to the population ASAP.
attributes.background: Make the vaccines available 24 hours a day to speed up the vaccination process of the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
